page.title: 15SALT WORKS
page.content: Centuries before Brithnoth fought the battle of Maldon,the Romans sett- led here.One of the reasons they chose Maldon was because of the salt which was more valuable than money in those days.The salt water was trapped in little creeks and the sun and wind dried it leaving the salt behind.In the original Domesday Book it says that the Maldon area had 45 salt pans. Today Maldon is the only place in the country where sea salt is manufactured The Maldon Crystal Salt Company have been producing salt for more than 200 years.The factory has been modernised but it still makes salt in the same way.The factory is close to the town centre.It is built on the Hythe and is one of the main areas where the river can be seen at work.
